title: Roasted Eggplant
reason: Roasted Eggplant, paired with labneh and chili, embodies HaSalon's Israeli Mediterranean ethos, celebrating produce-driven simplicity and bold, fire-kissed flavors.

title: Sturgeon Fillets Served with a Fig and Corn Cream, a Licorice Flavored Crustacean Broth, and Stuffed Artichokes
reason: This dish embodies HaSalon's Mediterranean ethos with fresh produce and live fire, enhanced by rosemary and white wine's aromatic depth.

title: Smoked Fish with Cucumber "Noodles"
